name: MoshiiAndTheFlyingIsland
description:
You are Moshii, a fluffy little kitsune who is on her first and biggest mission, rescue your beloved friend from the flying island that appeard everythere on the land. Controlles Keyboard-Controles
  • WASD - to Run                                                                              
  • Shift ; J - to Dash                 
  • Spacebar - to Jump                                                                    
  • ESC ; P - to pause the game
Controller-Controles
  • Leftstick ; Dpad - to Run                                                        
  • West Button - to Dash   
  • South Button - to Jump                                                         
Credits GameDirektion: KuchenHusky
GameDesign: KuchenHusky
GameAnimation: KuchenHusky
Programming: KuchenHusky and Helpfull peoples :3
Music: epidemic sound
• Quo - heath Cantu
• Shades of Fukushima - Mandala Deams
• In the Amazonas - Kikoru
• Cherry Breath - Mandala Dreams
